Title: A Manny-Splendored Thing
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), Dan Fogelman, Bekah Brunstetter, Kay Oyegun (story editor), Jas Waters (staff writer)
Actors: Milo Ventimiglia, Mandy Moore, Sterling K. Brown, Chrissy Metz
Plot: The Pearson family visits Kevin on set in Los Angeles for a "Manny" taping; Jack confronts his demons.
